description: This header file defines the API prototypes and related structures for interacting with DHCPv6 client information in a CCSP broadband environment. It includes function declarations for retrieving DHCPv6 and ECM DHCPv6 info and contains detailed documentation for each function.

methods.name: ert_dhcp6c_get_info
methods.description: Retrieves the current DHCPv6 client information into a provided structure.

methods.name: ecm_dhcp6c_get_info
methods.description: Retrieves the current ECM DHCPv6 information into a provided structure.
